snippet: Record-setting heat in a broad swath of states peaked this weekend, with above-normal triple-digit temperatures stretching from St. Louis to Washington.
abstract: Record-setting heat in a broad swath of states peaks, with above-normal triple-digit temperatures stretching from St Louis to Washington.

byline.original: By JOHN ELIGON and MARC SANTORA
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Monica Davey from Chicago, Aaron Edwards from New York, and Emmarie Huetteman, Adeshina Emmanuel and Rebecca Berg from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Record-setting heat in a broad swath of states peaked this weekend, with above-normal triple-digit temperatures stretching from St. Louis to Washington.

headline.seo: Temperatures Soar as Heat Wave Continues
headline.main: Unrelenting Heat Wave Bakes All in Its Reach
headline.print_headline: Unrelenting Heat Wave Bakes All in Its Reach
